name: Welcome to Hubery's homepage.
tagline: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
body:
### Who is Hubery?
Bachelor in Software engineering. Graduated from Xidian University in July 2013.
Now working in the roles as Application Consultant and Application Developer.

Please contact me on Hubery.Lee@outlook.com if you have any questions or feedback.

### Why this site?
In order to practice my programming skills and English, I decided to make this site.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
